overview: The story was inspired by a real incident that created a commotion in 2008 involving Verry Idham Henryansah, nicknamed Ryan, 34, who murdered 11 people and mutilated them. The confession in his prison autobiography, "The Untold Story of Ryan", revealed that Ryan often caught his mother cheating with many men. The film is in digital format.
title: Rien the Serial Killer
